Title: Truth
Writer: Philip K. Dick (based on the book by), Frank Spotnitz (developed by), Emma Frost
Actors: Alexa Davalos, Rupert Evans, Luke Kleintank, DJ Qualls
Plot: Juliana makes a startling discovery about her sister's death. Frank reflects on recent events and makes an important decision about his future, and Tagomi gains greater insight into Juliana's past.
